sqlMap.sql: BOARDNUM, USERID, SUBJECT, CONTENT, POSTDATE, HITS
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BOARDS SET SUBJECT = #subject#, CONTENT = #content# WHERE BOARDNUM = #boardNum#
UPDATE BOARDS SET HITS = HITS + 1 WHERE BOARDNUM = #boardNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DATA.* FROM ( SELECT FROM BOARDS WHERE $searchKey$ LIKE '%' || #searchValue# || '%' ORDER BY BOARDNUM DESC) DATA) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #start# AND #end#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDS WHERE $searchKey$ LIKE '%' || #searchValue# || '%'
